com.kuka.roboticsAPI.motionModel
Class SmartServo

All Implemented Interfaces:
com.kuka.roboticsAPI.commandModel.IAction, com.kuka.roboticsAPI.motionModel.IJointMotion, com.kuka.roboticsAPI.motionModel.IJointMotionWithDestination, com.kuka.roboticsAPI.motionModel.IKROSMotion, com.kuka.roboticsAPI.motionModel.IMotion, com.kuka.roboticsAPI.motionModel.IParameterizable, IServoMotion
public class SmartServo
extends ServoMotionJP<SmartServo>
implements com.kuka.roboticsAPI.motionModel.IJointMotionWithDestination

Smart servo motion. This class is used as follows:
SmartServo aSmartServoMotion = new SmartServoMotion();

physicalObject.moveAsync(aSmartServoMotion)

SmartServo

public SmartServo(com.kuka.roboticsAPI.deviceModel.JointPosition destination)
Servo The Parameter is the "initial target destination", whereto the system will move in the primary... Hint: If you like to program defensively, inquire the current Position from the device (see robot.getCurrentPosition())

Parameters:
destination - Initial target destination
Method Detail

setSpeedTimeoutAfterGoalReach

public SmartServo setSpeedTimeoutAfterGoalReach(double speedTimeoutAfterGoalReach)
Sets the timeout after which the robot starts to brake after the goal has been reached. Works only in velocity planning mode.

Default timeout is 0.0s and the maximal value is 0.1s.

Note: To use this feature the velocity planning mode has to be activated by calling ISmartServoRuntime.activateVelocityPlanning(boolean).

Parameters:
speedTimeoutAfterGoalReach - the timeout in seconds.
Returns:
self
See Also:
ServoMotion.getSpeedTimeoutAfterGoalReach()

getRuntime

public ISmartServoRuntime getRuntime()
Inquire the runtime information.

NOTE: It is available AFTER the motion has been activated, that means a call like
((PhysicalObject)toolAttachedToRobot).moveAsync(smartServo);
has been issued.

Overrides:
getRuntime in class ServoMotion<SmartServo>
Returns:
a mapped smartServo Runtime

setJointAccelerationRel

public final SmartServo setJointAccelerationRel(double acceleration)
Sets the normalized acceleration of the motion. Must be between 0.0 and 1.0.

Parameters:
acceleration - The acceleration of the motion. Must be between 0 and 1.
Returns:
This motion (builder pattern).
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if acceleration is not between 0 and 1.

setJointAccelerationRel

public final SmartServo setJointAccelerationRel(double[] acceleration)
Sets the normalized acceleration of the motion. Must be between 0.0 and 1.0.

Parameters:
acceleration - The acceleration of the motion. Must be between 0 and 1 for each axis.
Returns:
This motion (builder pattern).
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if acceleration is not between 0 and 1.

overrideJointAcceleration

public final SmartServo overrideJointAcceleration(double acceleration)
Override the acceleration factor for all joints. Must be between 0.0 and 10.0.

Parameters:
acceleration - the acceleration factor. Must be between 0.0 and 10.0.
Returns:
self

setJointOtgNumberofTraceRows

@Deprecated
public SmartServo setJointOtgNumberofTraceRows(int numberOfTraceRows)
Deprecated. Use setNumberOfTraceRows(int) instead.

Option to activate and set the trace for the joint otg module.

Parameters:
numberOfTraceRows - the number of rows in the joint otg trace file if 0 the trace is deactivated. max is 500000
Returns:
self

setNumberOfTraceRows

public SmartServo setNumberOfTraceRows(int numberOfTraceRows)
Option to activate and set the trace for the joint otg module.

Parameters:
numberOfTraceRows - the number of rows in the joint otg trace file if 0 the trace is deactivated. max is 500000
Returns:
self
